summary: IQ decreases by 20% after a 2-week holiday.

Roseanne wanted to go out for a beer with Kyle and Vince, and leave her kids with Megan.  Megan will clean the house and give Roseanne's kids her famous chocolate cookies if they help, what made Roseanne change her mind, and she wants to join them.
Carter is launching a restaurant business next month. Olivia wants him to include a restaurant she's working for in the discount app. They will meet in person to discuss it.
John and Missus keeps fighting as she wants him to spend more time with their family. John will let George know about Friday night.
Nadya has a headache because her neighbours' cleaner is being loud. She is expecting a baby. Sean will have breakfast after he does yoga.

Ricky will have his first surgery tomorrow. He was surprised that doctor called him and offered a surgery date so soon as in the hospital he was told to wait until 2026. He will have his knee done in Burlington. Lucy is comforting Ricky. They will meet for lunch later on.
Jojo has got a job offer and wants Matt's advice before taking a decision.
Tash is coming back from the train station now.
William was offered to work in Vienna for at least a year.
Emma and Hallie share links with info about that topic. Clara is grateful.
Joe is going to the supermarket and offers to get something for Meg.
Mira and Mia agree on onion soup today.

Jody hates ironing, especially her husband's shirts. She irons them because last time he did it, he burnt her favourite shirt and two of his own. Lynn suggests buying an ironing machine. Jody will visit her tomorrow around 2:00 to see how it works.
Daniel has had his test results back and all is well. Ann-Christine is pleased for him.
Leo will be late, he got into a fight with Michel. Nathan will order a beer for him.
Nick doesn't have any Halloween plans. He explains to Chris that we go to cementary and spend time with our families for November 1st. Chris changed his name for Arthur for the party yesterday.
Olga and Suzie will postpone their meeting due to Suzie's sickness.
Theo's going to stay near Torino in the region of Italian Alpes. Toby wants to join the trip. Theo agrees and will pick Toby up on Friday at 7 am.
Keaton is watching wrestling but Zeraldina informs her that her favourite actress is on channel 11.
Sally, Sam, Miranda, Danny and Doro will go to London to visit Ella. Ella cannot organize them hotels for their stay so Danny found an apartment for 1500 PLN on airb&b.
Lucy, Eli and Steve are going to participate in a bar game.
Carl, Evelyn and Marek are going to have a dinner on Thursday at Marek's place. Carl will invite Barbara.
Dan is joining a football game tonight. Milo can't join as he goes to a dentist. Dan will inform Matt.
Skyler and Adam are surprised that Joey and Olivia broke up.
Olivia went on a date. She doesn't know if she wants to continue this relationship. He invited Olivia to the cinema again.
Sam remembers it's her birthday in 2 days.They haven't speak for weeks. Tom is against.
Steven wants to discuss with his children a gift for Mum's birthday. Margaret suggests a food processor. Lesley mentions a spa break. Harry laughs at their suggestions. They will buy a spa break.

Amy and Jessica are planning a surprise birthday party for Julie, whose birthday is on Wednesday. The party will take place on Saturday at Julia's favourite Mexican place. John will assist with making the guest list.
Boris is shopping but he forgot the shopping list. He's got to buy ingredients for curry and fruit salad, as well as wine, vegetable burgers, cereals, plain yogurt and mangoes.
Richard and Peter broke up. They were more than 3 years together. Peter didn't accept Richard fully. Stephen, Guto, Ross and Han will be careful when talking to Richard.
Zhe's meeting is set to 2pm. He'll go to other party's office by taxi.
Liam and Oliver will meet in the hall in 10 minutes to have a break.
Carol is looking for the car keys. Mindy wasn't driving today. Pater has taken the keys with him on accident.

Fiona and Sean are going to a discussion about translating Andrei Platonov tonight. It takes place at a Polish bookstore on Sanderstrasse called "Buch Bund". It's in Polish and German. Fiona will let them know that they need headphones for the simultaneous interpretation.
Samantha and Evelyn after watching the video cannot believe she is able to make that noise.
John is asking Michael about his register. It is Ava who has it.
Ben points out sleeping alone as the worst thing about him and Hannah spliting up.
Stephanie shared Kev's number with Timothy.
Lucas will let Nathan wear his plain flannel shirt for Nathan's meeting with Kaylee.

Matt has been watching "House of Cards", eating pizza, meeting up with Martha and sleeping lately. He tried to talk with Martha about Saturday's party. Elle recommends Matt to watch "Designated Survivor".
Mark had to break wind, while being in a fancy restaurant. He sought to do it silently. He failed.
Mary bought new curtains.
Nina and Lila agree that Ella should buy the dress.
Chris, prompted by Facebook, wishes Sandra happy birthday but she submitted the wrong date and it is not her birthday.
Georgina missed a call from Linda. Georgina has been without the Internet for days. Georgina and Linda are complaining about NBN.
Arnold's buying a curved TV for Black Friday. Baldwin and Evelyn want one too, Arnold sends them the shop's location.
Ben needs Jakes laptop as his has some adapter issues. He will return it tomorrow, so Jake won't be able to play DOTA tonight.
Bill, Paul and Valerie are going to play games tonight at the cafe. Bill won't bring his own games tonight, because they still have some scenarios to finish.
Amanda and Olivier managed to get the tickets to the Harry Potter formal hall. Peter didn't get a ticket and they are sold out now.
Daca was supposed to have an operation but he was returned. Doctors recommend Daca and Jaca go to the Institut for "Mother and children". Ostoja is waiting for them in front of main entrance.
Thomas, Ann and Maria will have lunch together at the hotel. Ann is already in the 3rd floor lobby at the red table.
Hank asks Fay to buy ice-cream.

Peter and Jen are coming to Warsaw for the weekend to buy some things for the new apartment. They will stay at Alex's place and have a party. Jen and Peter like their new apartment but their neighbours complain about them making too much noise. They'll come on Saturday.
Bob and Alice discuss the panel which will take place tomorrow. Bob asks Alice's advice on what to talk about.
Arthur panicks if the gas bill is paid as the tech wants to turn off the gas. Linda sent him the bank confirmation.
Kate is still at the camp. Nia will come and say hi.
Jane is going for holiday again, this time to Turkey.
Ashley let Jill copy her homework for tomorrow. Jill's going out with her parents tonight and won't have time to do it herself.
Something funny happened in mats today involving the teacher, Mr McKormick. Shanon didn't see it because she's in the mountains with her parents.
Tim has recently changed his phone. He is back in Krakow, leaving for Canada in 3 weeks. Bart has just come from Bulgaria. He lives in Wroclaw and wants Tim to visit him.
Emma was late and missed Andy's song, but she still had fun.
Gabriel texted birthday wishes to Zuza's old phone number, so he wanted to correct his mistake.
Peter and Dorothy have to be there at 7, but when Peter arrives he wants to take a shower and eat something. There's little room in the garage to park.
Theresa was on TV.
Amy's birthday party gets great feedback from Ray, Garry, Paula, Kris and Rory. Some people like Rory or Garry had to leave earlier.
Andrzej isn't coming to Magda's class today.

Kate is at the Guggenheim Museum now, but will be in the Museum of the City of New York around 2-2:30. Kai may join her. Ish won't. Terry will join them for a coffee after they finish visiting the museum. Terry has already seen the museum.
Rob has a meeting in Plymouth at 11.30 and asks Sue to man the calls today. Rob expects a good job, engage Graham Mason in the job and start it after the New Year.
Lily wanted Mike to bring her her wallet, but it turned out she had it with her.
Josh has fun in Morocco. He's on the way to Tanger.
Thelma needs to look amazing so Louisa will get her her red velvet dress.
In 40 minutes a car will come to pick Sally up from her home. She will meet Prudence at work at 8:30.
Jessy and Clara noticed that Caroline bought a new dark blue Toyota car. Jessy and Clara are now considering the purchase of a used SUV, most likely Infinity or Toyota.
Ryan forgot to submit a programming project before the due date. Ryan's teacher demands he deliver the project now. Isaac sends Ryan a game he developed last semester.
Nathan is taking a lowe alpine.
Charlie passed the CLO exam and reveals to Kobe that it was possible because he had the Internet access and the person supervising didn't react on Charlie's cheating. Henrique helped Charlie as well.
Anne is wearing a yellow dress today. Neither Audrey nor Kate want to tell her it doesn't make her any good.
It's going to take a month to fix Natalie's car as she asked for original parts.
Khloe is proficient in Solid Works, AutoCAD, Sketch Up, Adobe Photoshop. Julian's manager will call Khloe soon.
Royce and Mario love each other and write to say goodnight.
Freda is going to the Christmas Party.
